RTâ€‚Chase Chapman
2 huge barriers to crypto adoption:
1) crypto people act like assholes in bull markets
2) the tech is complicated
"have fun staying poor" doesn't exactly motivate people to explore the space
if we fixed #1, people would probs be a lot more willing to learn
